title: Location, location, location–A study of factors affecting air quality in Swedish preschool yards

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 113

Author(s): Jenny Lindén, Mehjar Azzouz, Leonard Stockfelt, Malin Gustafsson, Peter Molnar, Malva Laurelin, Johanna Rieck Jildén, Helene Olofson, Ågot K. Watne
